sentences.sContent: All of it is growing alarmingly acidic, as the carbon dioxide spewed out by modern activities finds its way into the briny.
sentences.sContent_eng: All of it is growing alarmingly acidic, as the carbon dioxide spewed out by modern activities finds its way into the briny.
sentences.sCn: 现代生产中喷涌而出的二氧化碳最终会融入了海水，海洋整体的酸化也令人担忧。

trans.tranCn: 盐水的, 咸的, 海水的
trans.tranOther: briny water is water that contains a lot of salt
